description:
If you live in or around St. Louis, Missouri, and you suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of a workplace accident or an accident caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, you can turn to the legal professionals at the Bollwerk & Tatlow, LLC, law firm for the quality, personalized representation you need to help increase your chances of obtaining the full amount of compensation you deserve.

Serving the injured and disabled throughout the greater St. Louis metro region and surrounding areas of Illinois, our law firm's founding attorneys, Jill S. Bollwerk and Phillip A. Tatlow, each possess extensive legal experience and an impressive record of success. Over the years, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, including numerous six-figure settlements and awards.

While we cannot guarantee a specific outcome regarding your case, we can promise that we will work closely with you throughout all legal proceedings to help improve the likelihood that you will receive the maximum amount you need to cover your medical bills, lost wages, and support yourself and your family during this difficult time.

Here at Bollwerk & Tatlow, LLC, we handle all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims as well as workers' compensation, insurance appeals and ERISA disputes. If you are having problems securing the financial security you deserve following an accident that was not your fault, you can contact us by calling our office or visiting our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation.
